channel.title: Posts on Hirohisa Ebina
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hirohisa Ebina

item.title: Starting a New Postdoc
item.description: I’ve just moved from Tokyo Japan to Zürich Switzerland, to start a new chapter as a postdoc at ETH Zürich, studying genetic immunity in Schizosaccharomyces pombe (fission yeast). I’m very excited to work w/ Dr Barral and other great colleagues here to explore this exciting field!
